summary: Email from attorney Sigrid McCawley forwarding a legal filing in the US Virgin Islands by Ghislaine Maxwell. The email highlights contradictions between Maxwell's sworn depositions and the new filing, including statements about Epstein's financial support and unrevealed correspondence and companies.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP who forwards a legal filing regarding Ghislaine Maxwell, noting contradictions in Maxwell's statements.

persons.name: James E. Hill
persons.context: Original sender of the email containing the legal filing about Maxwell, forwarded to Sigrid McCawley.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Defendant in an indemnification action filed in the US Virgin Islands; her statements in the filing are noted as contradictory to previous sworn depositions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced in relation to Maxwell's claims about whether he assisted with her legal bills or provided anything of value.

connections.description: Maxwell's legal filing contains statements about whether Epstein assisted with her legal bills or provided anything of value, contradicting prior sworn depositions.
McCawley, as an attorney, is reviewing and forwarding a legal filing involving Maxwell, highlighting inconsistencies in Maxwell's statements.

events.title: Forwarding of Maxwell's legal filing
events.description: Sigrid McCawley forwards an indemnification action filed in the US Virgin Islands by Ghislaine Maxwell, noting contradictions in Maxwell's sworn statements.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell filed an indemnification action in the US Virgin Islands.

The filing contains statements directly contradictory to Maxwell's previous sworn depositions, including claims that Epstein did not assist with her legal bills and she received nothing of value from him.
The filing references correspondence that Maxwell had not previously produced in the case and lists companies she was apparently employed by.
ABC News is reportedly doing a story on the filing.
